The {{c|simd_abi::fixed_size&lt;N&gt;}} tag type ensures data-parallel types to store and manipulate {{tt|N}} elements (i.e. {{c|simd&lt;T, simd_abi::fixed_size&lt;N&gt;&gt;::size()}} returns {{tt|N}}). An implementation shall support at least all {{tt|N}} âˆˆ {{closed range plain|1|32}}. Additionally, for every supported {{c|simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;}}, where {{tt|Abi}} is an implementation-defined ABI tag, {{c|1=N = simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;::size()}} shall be supported.

===Notes===
An implementation may choose to forego ABI compatibility between differently compiled translation units for {{tt|simd}} and {{tt|simd_mask}} instantiations using the same {{c|simd_abi::fixed_size&lt;N&gt;}} tag. Otherwise, the efficiency of {{c|simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;}} is likely to be better than {{c|simd&lt;T, fixed_size&lt;simd_size_v&lt;T, Abi&gt;&gt;&gt;}} (with {{tt|Abi}} not an instance of {{c|simd_abi::fixed_size}}).
